statements: UPDATE athlete_profiles SET height = 180.5, weight = 75.3, progress_assessment = 'Great progress made' WHERE athlete_id = 101

UPDATE ProgressAssessments SET weight_progress = 80, endurance_progress = 90 WHERE athlete_id = 102;

UPDATE athletes SET age = 30, name = 'John Doe' WHERE athlete_id = '456789ab-cdef-1234-5678-abcdef123456';
UPDATE goals SET deadline = '2022-12-31', goal_description = 'Lose 5 pounds' WHERE athlete_id = '456789ab-cdef-1234-5678-abcdef123456';
UPDATE athletes SET age = age + 1, height = height + 0.5 WHERE name = 'John Doe'
UPDATE profiles SET bio = 'Fitness enthusiast with a passion for running', photo_url = 'https://example.com/profile.jpg' WHERE athlete_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

UPDATE progress_assessments SET assessment_result = 8.7, comments = 'Improving performance' WHERE athlete_id = 54321;
UPDATE athlete_profiles SET firstname = 'John', lastname = 'Doe', dob = '1990-05-15', gender = 'Male', height = 180.5, weight = 75 WHERE athlete_id = 123;
UPDATE goals SET goal_description = 'Increase strength and endurance', target_date = '2022-12-31', achieved = false WHERE athlete_id = 123;
